title: [BUG] SKMaskFilter.CreateBlur and SKMaskFilter.CreateGamma issue
body:
### Description

I'm struggling with some issue related to SKMaskFilter. I try to use Gamma, I found CreateGamma method available for SKMaskFilter. I want to apply this filter on whole SKBitmap. I tried something like code example in the documentation. But SKMaskFilter doesn't work for both blur and gamma. I figured out that blur works via SKImageFilter, but there is no Gamma.

### Code

```
using (var skPaint = new SKPaint())
            {
                using (var maskFilter = SKMaskFilter.CreateGamma(Gamma))
                {
                    skPaint.MaskFilter = maskFilter;

                    using (var skCanvas = new SKCanvas(bitmap))
                    {
                        skCanvas.DrawBitmap(bitmap, new SKRect(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height), skPaint);
                    }
                }
            }
```

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.6 (Current)
